scripts.build:ios:es: cd ios && xcodebuild -project mynativeapp.xcodeproj -configuration Release -scheme mynativeapp-ES -destination generic/platform=iOS -derivedDataPath build && cd ..
scripts.build:ios:us: cd ios && xcodebuild -project mynativeapp.xcodeproj -configuration Release -scheme mynativeapp-US -destination generic/platform=iOS -derivedDataPath build && cd ..
scripts.archive-for-devicefarm:ios: cd ios/build/Build/Products/Release-iphoneos && mkdir Payload && cp -R mynativeapp.app Payload/ && zip -r mynativeapp.ipa Payload/ && rm -rf Payload && cd ../../../../..
scripts.fastlane:ios:us: fastlane match appstore --username pedrojmendoza@gmail.com --app_identifier com.menpedro.base64util --git_url https://git-codecommit.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/v1/repos/AppStoreCerts && fastlane gym --project './ios/mynativeapp.xcodeproj' --scheme mynativeapp-US && fastlane pilot upload --username pedrojmendoza@gmail.com
